meanings.meaning: This involves the front oxygen sensor on Bank 1. This code indicates that the heated oxygen sensor reading is too high. In the case of Ford vehicles, that indicates the voltage at the sensor is over 1.5 volts. Other vehicles may be similar.

causes.cause: The oxygen sensor heater circuit is shorted out
The wiring to the sensor is broken / frayed (less likely)

descriptions.description: O2 Oxygen Sensor Circuit High Voltage (Bank1, Sensor1)

solutions.solution: Check for wiring problems (shorted, frayed wires)
Check the voltage of the oxygen sensor

symptoms.symptom: You will likely not notice any drivability problems.
